LanguageData.CYB_Alert_BodyfeederLowHemogenDesc:
A colonist with the bodyfeeder gene has low hemogen. At zero hemogen they will develop painful cravings, become increasingly violent, and eventually go berserk.

Feed them human flesh to increase hemogen. Hemogen packs will have little effect but may hold off starvation for a little while.

The following bodyfeeder colonists have low hemogen
